title: PD: Teenager shot in Phoenix neighborhood
content:
Autoplay:
PHOENIX - A teenager is recovering in the hospital after he was shot in Phoenix.
Phoenix police said the 17-year-old boy was shot near 44th Street and Southern Avenue on Thursday morning.
The teenager told police someone on a bike was trying to sell him a gun when it accidently went off.
Officials have searched the area but cannot find the shooter.
The boy’s injuries are not considered life-threatening.
